UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Activity and Action Mechanisms of Arg-Rich Short Analog Peptides Designed from the C-Terminal Loop Region of American Oyster Defensin (AOD)
Literature.Author: Seo JK, Kim DG, Lee JE, Park KS, Lee IA, Lee KY, Kim YO, Nam BH

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:<5% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml,Human dermal fibroblasts:12-13% Cytotoxicity=100 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis KCTC 1021(MEC=>100µg/ml),Cutibacterium acnes KCTC 3314(MEC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MEC=>100µg/ml),Streptococcus mutans KCCM 40105(MEC=>100µg/ml),Aeromonas hydrophila KCTC 2358(MEC=>100µg/ml),Escherichia coli D31(MEC=>100µg/ml),Escherichia coli ML-35p(MEC=>100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 2004(MEC=>100µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium KCTC 2514(MEC=>100µg/ml),Shigella sonnei KCTC 2009(MEC=>100µg/ml),Candida albicans KCTC 7965(MEC=>125µg/ml)
